core_principles: Clarity over Decoration: Data is the hero.
Speed Perception: Interface must feel instant (optimistic UI).
Competitive Tension: Leaderboards and rankings should feel 'alive'.
Trust: Professional typography and consistent spacing build confidence.
design_philosophy.theme_strategy: Dual Theme (Light Default, Dark Toggle). Light mode is 'Day Trading' (Professional, Crisp). Dark mode is 'Night Market' (Immersive, Contrast).

usage_rules: Use 'Manrope' for all page titles and section headers.
Use 'Inter' for all UI text, labels, and paragraphs.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' EXCLUSIVELY for stock prices, percentages, P&L, and account balances.

StockCard.props: bg-card border border-border shadow-sm rounded-xl p-4 md:p-6 transition-all hover:shadow-md hover:border-primary/20
StockCard.features: Ticker Top-Left, Mini-Chart Bottom, Price Big Right

LeaderboardRow.props: flex items-center justify-between p-4 border-b border-border last:border-0 hover:bg-muted/50 transition-colors
LeaderboardRow.rank_badge: Rank 1-3 get Gold/Silver/Bronze colored rings or icons. Others get simple numbers.

OrderForm.props: bg-card border border-border rounded-xl shadow-lg p-6

MarketStatus.props: sticky top-0 z-50 w-full backdrop-blur-md bg-background/80 border-b border-border flex items-center px-6 h-14

Button.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-sm h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-lg font-medium transition-all active:scale-95

glassmorphism.usage: Use for 'Market Status Bar' and 'Floating Action Buttons' (Mobile).

micro_interactions.live_pulse: Live prices flash green/red background briefly on update.

charts.style: Minimalist. Remove grid lines (or make them very subtle). Use gradients for area fills. Tooltip must be custom styled (dark bg, white text).

login_background.description: Use as a subtle background for the Login/Signup page with an overlay.

bull_bear_illustration.description: Use in the 'About' or 'Rules' modal to represent the market.

leaderboard_trophy.description: Use near the top ranked user on the dashboard.

market_chart_generic.description: Use for empty states or generic market visualization.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Implement the 'ThemeProvider' from 'next-themes' wrapping the app to handle light/dark mode toggling.
3. LAYOUT: Create a persistent 'DashboardLayout' component with Sidebar (Desktop) / BottomNav (Mobile) and TopBar.
5. DATA: Use 'JetBrains Mono' for ALL financial numbers. Ensure tabular-nums is on to prevent jittering prices.
6. COLOR: Do NOT use random colors. Stick to the Slate (Grey) + Blue (Primary) + Emerald/Red (Semantic) palette.
7. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, trade toggles).
universal_guidelines: Avoid gradients for backgrounds unless specified.
Never center align the entire app.
All interactive elements must have a hover state.
